_description: Feature Maturity Model (Apache Incubator-inspired). Levels: proposed, incubating, graduated, mature. Features regress if new findings are discovered.

features.name: event_sourcing
features.notes: Core architecture. 218 event types, 35 ledgers, dual-write. No findings in 4+ cycles.

features.name: draft_state_machine
features.notes: 6-state lifecycle. Last finding: req.destroy ordering (Cycle 11, fixed).

features.name: governance_choke_point
features.notes: Single sidecar. Execution boundary policy. No bypass. No findings in 4+ cycles.

features.name: builder_lane
features.notes: Complete implementation. Last finding: rubber-stamping detection (Cycle QA, fixed).

features.name: self_healing
features.notes: Circuit breakers, provider health, noise reduction. Last finding: startup recovery check.

features.name: m365_integration
features.notes: Mail, Calendar, Planner, To Do, SharePoint. Last finding: ensureValidToken in reconcile.

features.name: scheduler
features.notes: Cron matching, 6 gates, auto-dispatch. Last finding: DOW=7 Sunday (Cycle 11, fixed).

features.name: hipaa_compliance
features.notes: Entity-level overrides, PHI redaction. Last finding: case-sensitivity bypass.

features.name: ingestion_pipeline
features.notes: Inbox ingestion, dedup. Needs: more robust error handling, semantic dedup.

features.name: discovery_pipeline
features.notes: 90d email + 60d calendar scan. Needs: incremental discovery, better deal matching.

features.name: sharepoint_integration
features.notes: 7 routes. Needs: content extraction, document intelligence.

features.name: reconciliation_engine
features.notes: Planner/To Do sync, dedup. Last finding: graphFetchWithRetry upgrade.

features.name: schema_versioning
features.notes: Identified in research. Not yet implemented.

features.name: config_migration
features.notes: Identified in research. Not yet implemented.

features.name: prompt_registry
features.notes: Identified in research. Not yet implemented.

features.name: content_isolation
features.notes: Lethal trifecta mitigation. Not yet implemented.

features.name: evaluation_pipeline
features.notes: Expansion from 7 to 20+ fixtures. Not yet implemented.
